title: Tile Craft 3D
description: Tile Craft 3D is a fun coloring game where you stack tiles to create beautiful artwork. Match the numbers on the floor design to complete each masterpiece! Collect coins to upgrade your skills and hire helpers to speed up the painting process. As you lay down tiles, pick up coins and upgrade your abilities at the Upgrade Center. Reach level 5 to hire helpers and become a master tile crafter!
